mapper.select:
SELECT plan_no, TO_CHAR(plan_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') plan_dt, plan_nm FROM PLAN
AND plan_dt >= TO_DATE(#{planStartDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND plan_dt <= TO_DATE(#{planEndDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY plan_no

SELECT B.order_deta_no, B.order_no, TO_CHAR(A.paprd_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') paprd_dt, B.prdt_cd, (SELECT prdt_nm FROM prdt WHERE prdt_cd = B.prdt_cd) prdt_nm, B.order_qty, B.prdt_stc, '10' as day_out_put FROM order_tb A, order_d B WHERE A.order_no = B.order_no
AND B.order_no = #{orderNo}

SELECT * FROM co WHERE co_fg = 'P'
AND co_cd like '%'||#{coCd}||'%'
AND co_nm like '%'||#{coNm}||'%'

SELECT * FROM prdt WHERE 1=1
AND prdt_cd like '%'||#{prdtCd}||'%'
AND prdt_nm like '%'||#{prdtNm}||'%'
ORDER BY prdt_cd asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plan (plan_no, plan_dt, plan_nm) VALUES( CREATENO('PLA', PLANSEQ.nextval), TO_DATE(#{planDt}, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), #{planNm} )

SELECT nvl(max(plan_deta_no), 0)+1 from plan_d
INSERT INTO plan_d (plan_deta_no, plan_no, plan_dt, order_no, recv_dt, prdt_cd, plan_qty, wk_ord, wk_dt) VALUES( planDetaNo, CREATENO('PLA', PLANSEQ.nextval), TO_DATE(#{planDt}, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), #{orderNo}, TO_DATE(#{recvDt}, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), #{prdtCd}, #{planQty}, #{wkOrd}, TO_DATE(#{wkDt}, 'YYYY/MM/DD') )
